title: Top Places to visit in Samba, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Samba is a Municipal Committee city in the only sub-district "Samba Tahsil" of the Samba District in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir. With a population of about 12,700, Samba is the third least populous municipal committee in the district. Its total geographical area is 2 km2 (0.77 sq mi),
